about_the_game:
This DLC contains 5 new ship to play with. Each one with a different mix of weapons optimized to hunt down ships form the same class.
  • The Dreadnought is the new capital ship, it has the widest arsenal and a unique Mass driver Cannon, it can wrestle with any ship and come out on top.
  • The Missile Destroyer can unleash devastating salvo of missiles, or single out weak ship.
  • The Assault Frigate more leaner silhouette is paired with more turrets than what should fit on a ship this size.
  • The Missile Corvette, with it's deadly accurate missiles, is perfect to defend bigger ships.
  • The Interceptor forward beam cannon can cut most fighters in half under 20s.

This DLC contains 5 new ship to play with. Each one with a different mix of weapons optimized to hunt down ships form the same class.

  • The Missile Destroyer can unleash devastating salvo of missiles, or single out weak ship.
  • The Assault Frigate more leaner silhouette is paired with more turrets than what should fit on a ship this size.
  • The Missile Corvette, with it's deadly accurate missiles, is perfect to defend bigger ships.
  • The Interceptor forward beam cannon can cut most fighters in half under 20s.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 5 brand new ships, one for each size class.
